channel.title: Ip banning..help!
channel.description: IP banning won't really work, People keep clicking and can get in, sometimes it says Login failed because they're banned..But usually if they keep clicking they can get in. I've had this issue 3 times..Anyone help me?( I have the logs and data. They work, just people can bypass...)

item.title: Ip banning..help!
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

public void closeClient() { try { java.net.Socket s = server.clientListener.accept(); disconnected = true; this.destruct(); s.close(); } catch (IOException ioe) {} }

add that to your ipban method
it tested it out a few times and it works

Read full topic
